Text:
Just unrar to a folder and done. It is a complete installation of BETA, downloaded from Blizzard server and compressed to a torrent. 

Run "World of Warcraft Beta Launcher.exe" from inside that folder. 

Note, you need BETA-acess to login to the actual test-realms, or the realms will be marked red.

Interesting information and overview of the new expansion (link to wiki-page) 

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_of_Warcraft:_Mists_of_Pandaria

I am now sharing this file at put.io - username: cassmith

For instant access to the file, just friend me there.  Also, there have been many updates since this build, the launcher will still need to add around a 1gb of data.

thanks for the upload m8, But the game did not work with me.
when I try to log in into the realm I get the message "connected" but nothing happen.
BTW how do you update the beta since I click on launcher but it stuck at updating set up file
